summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's stormwater drainage facilities located at 3225 Perkins Lane West, Seattle, and at 3231 Perkins Lane West, Seattle (Section 15, Township 23 North, Range 3 East, W.M., King County, Washington); declaring these facilities to be surplus to the City's needs and not required for continued utility service and authorizing their conveyance to the owners of these properties.
